    Is necessary update uTouch to the last version adding this PPA:<br/>
    https://launchpad.net/~utouch-team/+archive/daily <br/>
    And install the DEB package from the [https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/oneiric/+source/touchegg/1.0-0ubuntu1 Launchpad page] or download and compile the source code: <br/>
    - [http://launchpadlibrarian.net/80526375/touchegg_1.0-0ubuntu1_i386.deb i386 DEB package] <br/>
    - [http://launchpadlibrarian.net/80528329/touchegg_1.0-0ubuntu1_amd64.deb amd64 DEB package] <br/>
    - [http://launchpadlibrarian.net/80527615/touchegg_1.0-0ubuntu1_armel.deb armel DEB package] <br/>
    - [http://launchpadlibrarian.net/80527664/touchegg_1.0-0ubuntu1_powerpc.deb powerpc DEB package] <br/>
    - [http://touchegg.googlecode.com/files/touchegg-1.0.tar.gz Source code]
 * *Arch Linux:* Available in [https://aur.archlinux.org/packages.php?ID=46809 AUR] (thanks to Chenxiaolong)
    {{{$ yaourt -S touchegg}}}
 * For other distros you can download and compile the *[https://code.google.com/p/touchegg/downloads/list source code]*
